Name: Symmetry: Early Access
About the game: A 3D platforming challenge like no other! Play solo or against up to 3 others in Symmetry - a ball roller that is sure to put your nerves to the test! See what players are saying below... 'Challenging, addictive and most importantly fun.' 'All-in-all, this game is a great challenge and I'm completely addicted to beating those lap times, which sees me replaying levels over and over. Great fun!' '...the game is great in quality, and fun to play' Symmetry features 4 ADDICTIVE MODES, which include: Solo ADVENTURE - Take on each of the elevated tracks as fast as possible, what time will you get? ACTIVATION - Light every switch on the map to summon the exit portal. Multiplayer (split-screen) RACE - 2-4 players, compete with your friends and family to see who rules each track! DOMINATION - Pure chaos! Challenge up to 3 others, grab the orb and light the most panels before time runs out. What will you take on first? Best experienced using a controller. Controllers are required for multiplayer modes. Warning This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions.
